Aries.career: Thrives in leadership, entrepreneurship, sports, military.
Aries.love: Passionate and direct in love, needs an equally energetic partner.

Taurus.career: Excels in finance, art, agriculture, real estate.
Taurus.love: Deeply loyal, seeks stability and comfort in relationships.

Gemini.career: Thrives in writing, media, sales, teaching.
Gemini.love: Needs intellectual stimulation, loves variety in relationships.

Cancer.career: Excellent in healthcare, education, social work, culinary arts.
Cancer.love: Deeply emotional, craves security and emotional bonding.

Leo.career: Shines in entertainment, management, politics, education.
Leo.love: Romantic and generous, needs admiration and loyalty.

Virgo.career: Excels in healthcare, research, accounting, writing.
Virgo.love: Reserved but deeply caring, values reliability in partners.

Libra.career: Thrives in law, diplomacy, design, counseling.
Libra.love: Seeks harmony and balance; romantic and idealistic.

Scorpio.career: Excels in research, psychology, detective work, finance.
Scorpio.love: Intensely loyal and passionate, values deep emotional connections.

Sagittarius.career: Thrives in travel, academia, publishing, sports.
Sagittarius.love: Freedom-loving, needs an intellectually stimulating partner.

Capricorn.career: Excels in business, administration, engineering, politics.
Capricorn.love: Slow to open up but extremely loyal and committed.

Aquarius.career: Thrives in technology, science, social causes, media.
Aquarius.love: Values intellectual connection and freedom in relationships.

Pisces.career: Excels in arts, music, spirituality, healthcare.
Pisces.love: Deeply romantic and empathetic, needs emotional security.
